item.title: Captive portal 强制门户
item.description: 强制门户（英文：Captive portal，又名强制网络门户、强制主页）是在授予新连接至Wi-Fi的用户更广的网络（互联网）访问权限之前在其

item.title: JSON-RPC
item.description: JSON-RPC From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Jump to navigationJump to search JSON-RPC is a remote procedure call protocol encoded in JSON. It is similar to the XML-RPC protocol, defining only a few data types and commands. JSON-RPC allows for notifications (data sent to the server that does not require a response) and for multiple calls to be sent to the server which may be answered asynchronously. Version Description Dated 1.0

item.title: CGI-万法归宗
